Content.Text:
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. Hello, <MYNAME>. I'm sorry, but I'm a bit
occupied right now. Could I ask you to wait a
few minutes?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting so long,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What was I doing? Well, working on a new
novel, of course.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to know what it's about?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ah! For once, I'm actually writing a romance. A
sad story of unrequited love.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Have you ever been in love, <MYNAME>?
Nope! Never.
Yes. Right now, in fact.
Once, long ago...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh really?
<PAGE>
That's too bad. I was hoping you might have
some wonderful romantic experiences you could
share, so I could take notes.
<PAGE>
So you're too busy with work and play to spare
time for love? That definitely sounds like you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But I do think it's good to try just about anything
once. You can never have too much knowledge
or experience.
<PAGE>
I'm not suggesting you FORCE yourself to fall in
love, mind you, but there is more to life than
your own work and hobbies.
<PAGE>
It might be good for you to try broadening your
horizons a little.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, I'm going to have to let you go, so
that I can get back to work. Have a good day,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, how wonderful! If you don't mind, I'd like to
hear about it. It might help me finish the book.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>This person you're in love with... Is it someone I
know?
I'm looking at her.
I can't say.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, now! You flatter me. Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But you shouldn't talk about love so lightly, I
don't think.
<PAGE>
Say it too many times too lightly, and it'll lose its
impact when you want it to mean the most.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You were being serious? Oho! All right, so you
are, then.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I'd best get back to work. I do need
to write, so could you please come back some
other time?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to chase you off so soon when you
were kind enough to come by and visit. Have a
good day, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Goodness. Was that simple naivete? Or
something else? I'll have to keep an eye on
him...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? That's a shame.
<PAGE>
But since you say that, I can infer that it's
almost certainly someone I know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee. In that case, I won't press for the
details.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, really? Would you mind telling me about it?
It might give me some ideas for my story.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that's a shame. Oh, well.
<PAGE>
Now then, I'd best get back to work.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry to chase you off so quickly, after you
were kind enough to stop by for a visit.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Have a good day, <MYNAME>.
